entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
